nodes.text: The master of the Nikto slave Horoth Gendi was a member of the Hutt species. A hermaphrodite like the rest of the species, Gendi's master bequeathed the Nikto Sector, a region of the moon Nar Shaddaa, to Gendi after the Nikto saved the Hutt's life in an act of quick-thinking violence. Gendi soon formed his own gang and ended his servitude to the Hutt.
Horoth Gendi's master was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Nikto Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
